text: aur (un ke liye) jinhone us ghar mein (yaani madina) aur imaan mein un se pehle jageh bana li hai aur apni taraf hijrath kar ke aane waalo se muhabbath karte hai aur muhaajireen ko jo kuch de diya jaaye us se wo apne dilo mein koyi tangi nahi rakhte, balke khud apne upar unhe tarjih dete hai, go khud ko kitni hee saqth haajath ho (baath ye hai) ke jo bhi apne nafs ke buql se bachaaya gaya wahi kamyaab (aur ba muraadh) hai
